http://www.guineeconakry.info/article/detail/historique-a-lorigine-de-la-fievre-ebola-en-guinee-forestiere/

"Sahr Laffalay  accompanies the corpse (of Fayiah Laffalay) [From Fangamandou] to Boidu and begins to feel ill with fever and malaise. Sahr Laffalay lived in the same compound as Mr. Zonas and his grandfather. Sahr Laffalay spends 4-5 days in Boidu where his illness progresses."

"His body was wrapped and transported to Boidu where it was
prepared for burial. Sahr Laffalay is buried the same day he died."
properties.name: Transport of probable ebola dead body from Fangamandu to Buedu (could be Bwedu/Boidu too).
